pkgmetadata.longdescription: The (Adaptive) Elastic Net and Lasso Penalized Sparse Asymmetric Least Squares (SALES) and Coupled Sparse Asymmetric Least Squares (COSALES) using Coordinate Descent and Proximal Gradient Algorithms // A coordinate descent algorithm for computing the solution paths of the sparse and coupled sparse asymmetric least squares, including the (adaptive) elastic net and Lasso penalized SALES and COSALES regressions.
